name: typeOnly
tagline: The JQuery plugin to type only a specific characters in a given input text element.
body:
# The jQuery plugin to type only specifics characters in a given input text element. #### Allows to control to the characters that will be typed in an input field. By defaults only numbers are allowed. But you can allow decimal numbers with a custom decimal separator there are two allowed, or only alphabetical characters also. All they with a given length which is passed as a parameter. **Default options:**
type : 'num'
digits : 8
separator :'.'
### The parameter called 'type' which determine the characters will be typed. Its allowed values are:
num only numbers
dec decimal number
alpha alphabetical characters. These are limited, you are free of add some more.
### The 'digits' parameter. digits are the length of the value, is an integer.
### The 'separator' parameter. separator is the separator for the decimal number only can be '.' dot or ',' comma and only one.
### Examples `$(selector).typeOnly();` `$(selector).typeOnly({type:'dec',digits:12,separator:','});`
`$(selector).typeOnly({type:'alpha',digits:2});`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
